verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bless the Lord, oh my soul
And let all that's within me
Shout out, shout out

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We have come to give You glory
We have come to give You praise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You're welcome in this place
You're welcome in this place
You're welcome in this place
